contents.contents: Walk along the ramparts and walk out the Jouy door. Turn left and keep walking.
Imagine how long the ramparts were when they circled the town!

question.contents: How long are the ramparts today?
choices: The length of one football field

explanations.contents: Today, the ramparts are 1200 metres long, that is to say roughly the length of 10 football fields. But in the past, they were 5 kilometres long, so the length of 41 football fields!
